MMWave_ContCalibrationCfg_t Struct Reference
mmWave API » mmWave External Data Structures

Continuous Calibration configuration. More...

#include <control/mmwave/mmwave.h>

Data Fields

bool enableOneShotCalibration
 In continuous mode; only one shot calibration is supported Set this flag to enable this feature.
 

Detailed Description

Continuous Calibration configuration.

The structure is used to hold the information which is required to setup the calibration of the RF while operating in continuous mode
